info.author: Simon J.L. Billinge
info.description:
DiffPy (diffraction in Python) is a collection of libraries and 
applications for analyzing structure of materials from neutron 
or x-ray diffraction data.

diffpy is not a package by itself, it is rather a common top-level
namespace for all of its components.
info.keywords: diffraction "structure analysis" crystallography neutron x-ray scattering
info.name: diffpy
info.summary: Top-level namespace package for the DANSE-diffraction software
info.html_description:
DiffPy (diffraction in Python) is a collection of libraries and applications for analyzing structure of materials from neutron or x-ray diffraction data.

diffpy is not a package by itself, it is rather a common top-level namespace for all of its components.
